body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, attorney. Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, native. Married Sarah L. Eginton. Father of Mary J. Eginton and Thomas M. Eginton. Attorney in Clark County in 1850 and 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in 1850 and seven in 1860.
